item.title: Acknowledgements
item.description: Acknowledgements # Firstly to Bryn Reinstadler, who in writing her eBook Calling it Round showed me how an eBook can be produced and published quickly using Hugo on GitHub. Then to Lucas Williams who rose to the challenge of working out how to write in Hugo and putting all these pages together for me. The filming in chapters three and four was done by Dan Hunt and then edited by Colin Newman, leader of the CCCBRâ€™s Schools and Youth groups Workgroup.
